item.title: 10 years ago today, CL made her solo debut with ‘The Baddest Female.’
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Ice Spice earns the biggest debut by a female rapper on Global Spotify, with ‘Karma’ (Remix).
item.author: PopBase

item.title: ‘AMERICA HAS A PROBLEM‘ (Remix) by Beyoncé feat. Kendrick Lamar reaches a new peak in streams of 2.02 million.
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
Taylor Swift charts 13 songs from ‘Midnights’ on US Spotify.
#1. Karma (ft. Ice Spice) — 2.28M (NEW) #2. Hits Different — 1.94M (NEW) #4. Snow On The Beach (ft. More Lana Del Rey) — 1.79M (NEW) #12. Anti-Hero — 951k (+5) #23. Lavender Haze — 756k (+32) #24. Karma — 753k (+1)… Show more
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
‘Dance The Night’ by Dua Lipa debuts at #20 on Global Spotify with 2.95 million streams.
It also debuts at #31 on US Spotify with 703k streams.
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
‘Hits Different’ by Taylor Swift debuts at #8 on Global Spotify with 4.81 million streams.
It also debuts at #2 on US Spotify with 1.94 million streams.
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
‘Snow On The Beach’ by Taylor Swift ft. more Lana Del Rey debuts at #6 on Global Spotify with 5.03 million streams.
It also debuts at #4 on US Spotify with 1.79 million streams.
item.author: PopBase
